amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Energy to review and update the data used for a 9-year old Federal study on re-refined oil, and requires the development of a strategy to increase its collections and sustainability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (IN) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (IN) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mrs. Brooks (IN).
